Awkward.name: Awkward

starts.title: Both players make silly faces at each other
starts.extra: Also, make strange noises

starts.title: Both players maintain 10 seconds of eye contact
starts.extra: ... with your foreheads almost touching

suggestions: Pretend you just met on a bad date

Creative.name: Creative

starts.title: Start a sentence for the other player to finish
starts.extra: Also, make the sentence rhyme

starts.title: Pretend you are a mirror image of the other player
starts.extra: ... while the other player dances

suggestions: Draw a picture of each other in the air

starts.title: Both players shake hands with each other
starts.extra: ... warmly, using both hands and eye contact

starts.title: Give each other a side-hug
starts.extra: Also, hold it 20 seconds and synch breathing

starts.title: Both players wink at each other dramatically
starts.extra: Also, compliment each other

starts.title: Both players take off their shoes
starts.extra: Also, invent a wacky handshake with your feet

Disgusting.name: Disgusting

starts.title: Both players make yucky faces at each other
starts.extra: Also, make gross, nasty noises

starts.title: Both players touch their foreheads to the floor
starts.extra: ... and also sniff the floor

suggestions: Name the worst smell you know

starts.title: Both players stretch as high as they can
starts.extra: ... while jumping as high as they can

starts.title: The larger player will try to pick up the smaller
starts.extra: ... and carry them around the room

starts.title: Both players stare at each other disdainfully
starts.extra: Also, criticize each other's appearance

starts.title: Both players disclose something embarrassing
starts.extra: Also, mock the other player's disclosure

Inedible.name: Inedible

starts.title: Both players choose a mild spice/sauce to taste
starts.extra: Choose something spicy or gross

starts.title: Both taste a random food from the fridge
starts.extra: Choose for each other

suggestions: Create a menu of cursed dishes

starts.title: Both players disclose a hope, dream, or flaw
starts.extra: ... Make it something secret or embarrassing

starts.title: Maintain eye contact for ten seconds
starts.extra: Also, try to synchronize your breathing

starts.title: Both players make silly faces at each other
starts.extra: Also, make immature noises

starts.title: Both players look up each other's noses
starts.extra: Also, describe boogers like an avid archeologist

starts.title: Both players describe a kink they have heard of
starts.extra: Both players disclose a kink they have

starts.title: Both players swat themselves
starts.extra: Both players gently swat each other

Messy.name: Messy

starts.title: Both players muss up their own hair
starts.extra: Muss up each other's hair

starts.title: Both players smear food around their mouths
starts.extra: Help each other apply the food

suggestions: Wear a silly hat you make now

starts.title: Toss a piece of food into the other player's mouth
starts.extra: If it falls on the floor, thrower has to eat it

starts.title: Balance a cup of water on each other's head
starts.extra: ... Make it a cup of milk or soda

Sensual.name: Sensual

starts.title: Both players wink at each other flirtatiously
starts.extra: Also, compliment each other's appearance

starts.title: Both players take off shoes (keep them off)
starts.extra: Also, play footsie with each other

suggestions: Trace a heart on the other's palm

starts.title: Both players make faces at each other
starts.extra: ... while babbling incoherently

starts.title: Both players make up a bizarre dance
starts.extra: ... while chanting each other's name
